entry.data:
SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH, DECREASING TO 40 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
